sources.full: Way of the Four Elements, Streamlined

subclass.name: Way of the Four Elements Streamlined

subclasses.name: Way of the Four Elements Streamlined
Way of the Four Elements Streamlined

subclassFeatures: Way of the Four Elements|Monk||Four Elements (St)|4EL-S|3

subclassFeature.name: Way of the Four Elements
entries: You follow a monastic tradition that teaches you to harness the elements. When you focus your ki, you align yourself with the forces of creation and bend the elements to your will, using them as an extension of your body. Some monks of this tradition are dedicated to a single element, but others weave the elements together.
Many monks of this tradition tattoo their bodies with imagery of their ki powers, commonly seen as coiling dragons, but also as phoenixes, fish, plants, mountains, cresting waves, and more.

subclassFeature.name: Disciple of the Elements
entries: At 3rd level, you learn magical disciplines, powered by your ki, that harness the power of the four elements.

entries.name: Mantras
entries: You learn two mantras of your choice, detailed under Elemental Disciplines below. A mantra allows you to cast its associated cantrip without needing to provide the cantrip's material components. You learn another mantra of your choice at 10th level.

entries.name: Disciplines Known
entries: You know two elemental disciplines of your choice, choosing from the options listed in the Minor Disciplines section of the Elemental Disciplines below. The Disciplines Known column of the Four Elements Spellcasting table shows when you learn more disciplines of your choice, which must be of a level for which you have spell slots from this feature. For instance, when you reach 7th level in this class, you can learn one new minor or lesser discipline.
Each time you gain a level in this class, you can replace one discipline that you know with a different discipline. The new discipline must be of a classification for which you have spell slots.

entries.name: Spell Slots and Ki
entries: The Four Elements Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your spells of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You can also expend ki when you cast a spell to increase the spell's level for that casting by the amount of ki spent, up to the highest level spell slot available to you. You regain expended spell slots from this feature when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Casting Elemental Spells
entries: Knowing an elemental discipline allows you to cast that discipline's associated spell. You follow the normal rules for spellcasting when you cast a spell through a discipline, but you don't need to provide material components for the spell. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your mantras and disciplines, as you draw elemental magic from the environment around you through patience and practice.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Attunement
entries: Also at 3rd level, through training, you have learned to identify and examine the elements of the world, and to call forth small amounts of elemental energy at will.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Nature} skill if you don't already have it. If you already have it, your proficiency is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the skill.
Additionally, you can use your action and choose a valid target within 30 feet of you to cause one following effect of your choice:

items: Instantly light or snuff out fire that fits entirely into a 10-foot cube.
Create a blast of air that moves one object weighing 10 lbs or less and that isn't being held or carried up to 30 feet away from you.
Move loose earth or water that fits into a 10-foot cube up to 10 feet in any direction. This movement doesn't deal damage.
Freeze water that fits into a 10-foot cube, provided there are no creatures in it, for 1 hour.
Cause earth, fire, water, or mist that can fit within a 10-foot cube to shape itself into a crude form you designate for 10 minutes.

subclassFeature.name: Primal Dance
entries: At 6th level, you can weave elemental energy into your attacks and movement in a display akin to a dance.

Choose one of the options below when you gain this feature. When you attack with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon, you can expend a ki point to gain the benefit listed under that option. When you finish a short or long rest, you can choose a different option for this feature, replacing your previous choice with the new one.

entries.name: Body of Unbreakable Earth
entries: You gain temporary hit points equal to your martial arts die + your Wisdom modifier, and on a hit, you can impose your Stunning Strike on the target without spending its ki cost.

entries.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
entries: Your reach with your unarmed strikes increases by 10 feet, your unarmed strikes deal fire damage instead of their normal damage type, and your unarmed strikes deal {@dice 1d4} extra fire damage. These benefits last until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Violent Tornado's Grip
entries: Your speed increases by 10 feet until the start of your next turn (this benefit can stack). On a hit, the target takes {@dice 1d10} slashing damage, and you can push a Huge or smaller target up to 20 feet away from you if it fails a Strength saving throw.

entries.name: Whips of Crushing Water
entries: Your reach increases to 30 feet for this attack, and instead of making an attack roll, your target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes cold damage equal to {@dice 1d10} + your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier, and if it is Huge or smaller, you can pull it 20 feet towards you or knock it {@condition prone}.

subclassFeature.name: Avatar's Mantle
entries: At 11th level, you learn to convert ki into a cloak of elemental energy.

You can spend 4 ki points to cast one of the following spells: {@spell investiture of flame|XGE}, {@spell investiture of ice|XGE}, {@spell investiture of stone|XGE}, or {@spell investiture of wind|XGE}.
Also, whenever you use the action granted by one of these spells, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action, or you can use your Flurry of Blows.

subclassFeature.name: Graceful Elementalist
entries: At 17th level, your mastery of elemental magic grants you greater control over the elements around you.
Your Elemental Attunement gains the following changes:

items: A valid target can be within 120 feet of you, instead of 30 feet.
You can affect a 30-foot cube of material, instead of a 10-foot cube, and the materials you affect now include ice, solid stone, and densely packed earth.
The blast of air can move an object that weighs no more than 60 lbs up to 180 feet away from you.

entries: Also, you don't need to concentrate on your Avatar's Mantle spells, you add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with the spells' actions, and you regain ki spent to cast the spells when they end.

optionalfeature.name: As Nature, Endure
entries: You can cast {@spell absorb elements|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Bitter Cold Snap
entries: You can cast {@spell frostbite|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Breath of Winter
entries: You can cast {@spell ice storm}.

optionalfeature.name: Call of Four Thunders
entries: You can cast {@spell thunderwave}.

optionalfeature.name: Chains of the Eel
entries: You can cast {@spell lightning lure|tce}.

optionalfeature.name: Clench of the North Wind
entries: You can cast {@spell hold person}.

optionalfeature.name: Crashing Titan
entries: You can cast {@spell thunder step|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Cry of the Land
entries: You can cast {@spell earth tremor|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Dancing Cinders
entries: You can cast {@spell create bonfire|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Depth's Cradle
entries: You can cast {@spell water breathing}, targeting yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Earth's Cradle
entries: You can cast {@spell maximilian's earthen grasp|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Earth's Judge
entries: You can cast {@spell shillelagh}.

optionalfeature.name: Earth's Spinal Prison
entries: You can cast {@spell entangle}.

optionalfeature.name: Eyes of Heaven
entries: You can cast {@spell frostbite}.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Dragon's Fury
entries: You can cast {@spell scorching ray}.

optionalfeature.name: Flames of the Phoenix
entries: You can cast {@spell fireball}.

optionalfeature.name: Fury of the Sea
entries: You can cast {@spell tidal wave|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Gong of the Summit.
entries: You can cast {@spell shatter}.

optionalfeature.name: Guardians of the World
entries: You can cast {@spell conjure minor elementals}.

optionalfeature.name: Hidden in the Mist
entries: You can cast {@spell fog cloud}.

optionalfeature.name: Jaws of Earth and Wind.
entries: You can cast {@spell dust devil|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Leap of the Grasshopper.
entries: You can cast {@spell jump}.

optionalfeature.name: Mist Stance
entries: You can cast {@spell gaseous form}, targeting yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Molten Magma's Embrace
entries: You can cast {@spell heat metal}.

optionalfeature.name: One with the Earth
entries: You can cast {@spell meld into stone}.

entries: You can cast {@spell aura of purity}.

entries: You can cast {@spell barkskin}.

optionalfeature.name: Pummeling Slate Stance
entries: You can cast {@spell magic stone|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Reflect Upon Oneself
entries: You can cast {@spell calm emotions}.

optionalfeature.name: Resolute Mountain
entries: You can cast {@spell stoneskin}, targeting yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Ride the Wind
entries: You can cast {@spell fly}, targeting yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Ripping Tidal Prison
entries: You can cast {@spell watery sphere|XGE}.

optionalfeature.name: Rippling Thunder Blow
entries: You can cast {@spell thunderous smite}.

optionalfeature.name: River of Hungry Flame
entries: You can cast {@spell wall of fire}.

optionalfeature.name: Roar in the Valley
entries: You can cast {@spell wind wall}.

entries: You can cast {@spell call lightning}.

entries: You can cast {@spell gust of wind}.

entries: You can cast {@spell storm sphere|XGE}.

entries: You can cast {@spell thaumaturgy}.

entries: You can cast {@spell continual flame}.

optionalfeature.name: Water is Drawn to Water
entries: You can cast {@spell create or destroy water}.

optionalfeature.name: Wave of Rolling Earth
entries: You can cast {@spell wall of stone}.

optionalfeature.name: Winter's Open Palm
entries: You can cast {@spell ice knife|XGE}.
